reviews.review_msg: She is the best prof. I 've ever met in SFU.

Amazing teacher - didn't waste time, flew through examples being sure to highlight key points. This woman set me on the path to a professional graphic design career, and I now own my own company. Can't speak highly enough of her.
One of the nicest people I ever met. She is also very knowledgeable about her field. She encourages you to use your imagination and your knowledge together. The course is fun.

She is wonderful, she'll make you like school again. It's a shame she doesn't teach any of the 1st or 2nd year cmns courses, it might have made me like school more..; ) If you want to be a graphic designer, or are unsure, take this class, it might change everything!
Nice prof, easy marking and easy course afterall
one of the nicest instructors. very helpful and an extremely interesting and useful class.
If you love arts/graphic design then you're going to love this class. This is one of the best classes that I have ever taken :)
Very passionate about graphics design, always eager to provide extra help, very fair on marking so don't take her classes if u're planning to slack off in it.
Taking her class now..she's ok...well prepared and helpful in saturday workshops...yet boring in lectures.  Not as easy as I thought
Great teacher! Very enthusiastic about the topic =)

Very good professor for this course, but if anybody had taken CMNS 130 with her would know that she ain't that great in that class. Anne is very organized in terms of material preparation, but may sometimes also be clueless about the thing she teaches.
473 was an awesome course and Anne was a great prof. She was helpful and will give you good feedback on your work.
She is an excellent instructor. I am so glad I took her course. One of the best courses!
